doc:
Leo Ford https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leo_Ford 0 Leo Ford (born Leo John Hilgeford; July 5, 1957 – July 17, 1991) was an American pornographic actor who appeared in gay pornographic films and bisexual pornographic movies and magazines in the 1980s. He was born in Dayton, Ohio. Leo_Ford ( born Leo_John_Hilgeford ; July_5_,_1957 – July_17_,_1991 ) was an_American_pornographic_actor who appeared in gay_pornographic_films and bisexual_pornographic_movies and magazines in the_1980s . He was_born in Dayton , Ohio .
